p: The possible mechanisms for antimicrobial activity of carvacrol and thymol could be attributed to structural and functional damages to the cell membrane by disruption of the outer membrane, interfering with membrane proteins and periplasmic enzymes (Di Pasqua et al., 2007; Helander et al., 1998; Jafri et al., 2019; La Storia et al., 2011; Moosavy et al., 2008).
